title: Bollywood Medhu Vada (Savory Lentil Dumplings)
directions: Soak the lentils overnight and drain well, in a colander. This will remain some residual water.
Place the lentils with the ginger, salt, baking soda and peppercorns in a food processor.
Process for about 5 minutes, with a few pulses, before turning on continuously for 2 minutes.
Heat the oil in a wok for 2 minutes on medium heat.
Take a small amount of the lentil mixture in your palm, insert a small clean hole in the center and gently lower into the oil.
Do this with about 4 pieces, to fill the wok without crowding the wok.
Cook for about 3 to 4 minutes on each side until golden crisp and turn and fry on the other side.,
Remove and drain on paper towels, until all the batter is used up.
